messages.message:
Hi team,
Is it possible for us to add next document button to the Ground truth table (like next field button) to make it more easy to move around in other docs in the same field?
you need to open this “Compare values” modal for the same field across multiple docs? can you explain why you need to open the modal and why the underlying “Ground truth table” isn’t sufficient?

For instance, consider a field like "Name of the Company," along with 15 other fields spread across more than 50 documents. If the accuracy for this field is low, we need to compare the extracted values with the actual ground truth. It would be much easier to navigate through this specific field across all documents in one place, rather than repeatedly opening and closing each document. This would save multiple clicks and streamline the process.

you can already compare the field values across multiple documents in the “Ground truth table”, though?

is the “Ground truth table” not sufficient for what you need to compare?
These are manageable for text fields and not for list extraction or table extraction.
got it, makes sense! we’ve received similar feedback before and have included in your feedback in this existing ticket (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3335)
